Detailed Description

A class for indicating that a plug-in requires registration but does not provide an evaluation period.

This class is used to indicate that a plug-in is only enabled when the user has entered a valid serial number for the plug-in. See the documentation of DzPlugin for a description of how to easily implement and provide activation policies in a DAZ Studio plug-in.
